definitions.definition: An early type of firearm , using a spring-loaded flint to strike sparks into the firing pan .
A type of lock used on muskets , rifles , and pistols from the early 17th to the mid-19th century.

main_definition: An early type of firearm , using a spring-loaded flint to strike sparks into the firing pan .
secondary_definitions: A type of lock used on muskets , rifles , and pistols from the early 17th to the mid-19th century.
